fields.summary: Created from API call - Story of Shri Lal Bahadur Shastri
fields.description: Created using Rest Assured Library - Shri Lal Bahadur Shastri was born on October 2, 1904 at Mughalsarai, a small railway town seven miles from Varanasi in Uttar Pradesh. His father was a school teacher who died when Lal Bahadur Shastri was only a year and half old. His mother, still in her twenties, took her three children to her father’s house and settled down there.      https://www.pmindia.gov.in/en/former_pm/shri-lal-bahadur-shastri/
